text: Giuseppe "Bepi" Ros (22 September 1942 – 17 February 2022) was an Italian heavyweight boxer. He won a bronze medal at the 1964 Summer Olympics. Giuseppe Ros . sports-reference.com He retired in 1976. Giuseppe Ros . boxrec.com Ros died from COVID-19 on 17 February 2022 in Vittorio Veneto, Italy at the age of 79.Conegliano, l’ex pugile Bepi Ros muore di Covid sei giorni dopo il fratello ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Italian boxers Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Italy
title: Giuseppe Ros
